reviewText: I bought this for my sister as a gift.  She really likes animals.  I had seen the first movie with Eddie and thought is was pretty funny.  However I haven't watched the other movies that are included.  So I don't know how good they are.I got this one because it was a great deal for 4 movies.  To buy them individually would have been much more.
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged

reviewText: I was always a fan of Eddy Murphy.  when Dr. Dolittle came out, I really enjoyed this movie over and over.  this box set has the first movie which is great. it also has the second which was okay.  this set also includes two movies staring the daughter. which is alright but if your wanting the just the Eddy Murphy then you might want to pass on this box set. I personally don't mind so to each there own.
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged

reviewText: When there is a 4 pack that you can watch. Just because Eddie is only in the 1st 2 movies does not make the last ones bad.
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged

reviewText: I dont really care about 3 & 4. I liked 1 and 2 a lot and getting the 4 pack was cheaper than getting them separately.Not much else to say here.The movie itself is about a man who can talk to animals and denies his special talent in the first one, but learns to embrace it as time goes on.I dont think it needed a PG-13 rating...but parents should watch it first just to be safe... I dont know how strict some of you guys are.
summary: Cheaper to get all four than just 1 & 2
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged

reviewText: This is a great series - enjoyed every minute. Eddie Murphy is a great comic, every movie i have with him in it is great.
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged

reviewText: Product played great and they were funny and very entertaining. Good clean, funny and very entertaining. An animal lovers delight.
Title: Dr. Dolittle 4 Pack Repackaged
